item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy This privacy policy applies to the NASApod app (hereby referred to as “Application”) for mobile devices that was created by Shen YuTao (hereby referred to as “Service Provider”) as a Commercial service. This service is intended for use “AS IS”. Information Collection and Use The Application collects information when you download and use it. This information may include information such as Your device’s Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP
